results.title: Biden Administration Aims to Trump-Proof the Federal Work Force
results.abstract: If Donald Trump wins a second term, he and his allies want to revive a plan to allow a president to fire civil service workers who are supposed to be hired on merit. The Biden administration is trying to thwart it.
